name: cami
author: Kenn Costales <kenn@askmonolith.com>
description: A minimalist & flexible toolkit for interactive islands & state management in hypermedia-driven web applications.

scripts.build: mkdir -p examples/build && esbuild src/cami.js --bundle --sourcemap --target=es2015 --format=esm --outfile=build/cami.module.js && cp build/cami.module.js examples/build/cami.module.js && esbuild src/cami.js --bundle --sourcemap --target=es2015  --format=iife --global-name=cami --outfile=build/cami.cdn.js && cp build/cami.cdn.js examples/build/cami.cdn.js && esbuild src/cami.js --bundle --target=es2015 --format=iife --global-name=cami --outfile=docs/javascripts/cami.cdn.js && sh build_examples.sh
scripts.build:minify: mkdir -p examples/build && esbuild src/cami.js --bundle --sourcemap --target=es2015 --minify-whitespace --minify-identifiers --format=esm --outfile=build/cami.module.js && cp build/cami.module.js examples/build/cami.module.js && esbuild src/cami.js --bundle --sourcemap --target=es2015  --minify-whitespace --minify-identifiers --format=iife --global-name=cami --outfile=build/cami.cdn.js && cp build/cami.cdn.js examples/build/cami.cdn.js && cp build/cami.cdn.js docs/javascripts/cami.cdn.js && cp build/cami.cdn.js.map docs/javascripts/cami.cdn.js.map && sh build_examples.sh
scripts.build:docs: jsdoc2md ./src/reactive-element.js > ./docs/api/reactive_element.md && jsdoc2md ./src/http.js > ./docs/api/http.md && jsdoc2md ./src/observables/observable.js > ./docs/api/observable.md && jsdoc2md ./src/observables/observable-state.js > ./docs/api/observable_state.md && jsdoc2md ./src/observables/observable-store.js > ./docs/api/observable_store.md && jsdoc2md ./src/observables/observable-stream.js > ./docs/api/observable_stream.md && mkdocs build
